Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: J sc derived from the EQE spectra were estimated to be 14.12 , 14.92 , 16.29 , and 14.21 mA cm^-2 for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 - based devices , respectively , which were in good agreement with those obtained from J-V characterization ( Figure 6 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Property Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J |
| EQE spectra |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |
| J-V characterization |
| Figure 6 |

Note that "J" is a property name in the context of the paragraph, as it refers to the current density of the devices. Similarly, "EQE spectra" is a property name as it refers to the external quantum efficiency spectra of the devices. "PffBB-10", "PffBB-12", "PffBB-14", and "PffBB-16" are also property names, as they refer to the names of the devices being studied. Finally, "J-V characterization" and "Figure 6" are not property names, but rather a reference to a characterization technique and a figure in the document, respectively.
